title: Add unit tests for TransferQueue recursive operations
description:
TransferQueue needs comprehensive unit tests before the recursive download bug can be safely fixed. Tests needed:
1. Test enqueueRecursiveDownload with mock FTP client
2. Test directory scanning state machine (scanningDirectories_ flag)
3. Test that downloads don't start until all directories are scanned
4. Test path calculation for nested directories
5. Test interaction between TransferQueue and FTP client signals
6. Test cancellation during recursive operations
7. Test error handling during recursive operations

Requires setting up Qt Test framework and mocking the C64UFtpClient.
close_reason: Added Qt Test framework with mock FtpClient and 8 unit tests for TransferQueue recursive operations

title: Recursive folder download incomplete - only downloads partial files
description: When downloading a folder recursively from C64U device, only partial files are downloaded. Test case: BBS folder with 2 subdirs (CCGMS Ultimate, UltimateTerm) containing 6 total files - only 2 files were downloaded. Root cause appears to be async FTP operations conflicting - directory scanning and file downloads share the same FTP client which can only do one operation at a time. Added scanningDirectories_ flag but still incomplete. Needs proper unit tests before further debugging.
close_reason: Fixed by normalizing remote paths to remove trailing slashes before processing
